comment.author: 26220432@N06
comment._content:
** translation of describtion **

Repatriates. Tired and melancholic repatriates from Indonesia who came to the Netherlands on the "M.S. Tegelberg". Children in and around a bunkbed.
Holland, agust 28th 1946

comment.author: 47133306@N05
comment._content: I sailed on the Tegelberg in April-May 1956 as a 4 and a 1/2 year-old from Hong-Kong to Rio de Janeiro (Brazil) with my parents to start a new life.... Slept in one these bunks!
